name: check-hstr
title: Honkai Star Rail
description: Memeriksa nama/nickname pemain Honkai Star Rail berdasarkan User ID dan Server.

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.label: User ID
parameters.placeholder: Masukkan User ID Honkai Star Rail

curl:
curl -X POST https://bovalone.me/api/check-hstr \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer YOUR_API_KEY" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{"user_id":"12345678", "additional_id":"Asia"}'
